0.name: Fast Facts
0.description: First Research Call Prep questions are industry specific questions from D&B’s First Research Industry Profiles, which encompass over 900 industry segments. Embed this micro app into your CRM or sales portal to empower sales teams with engaging conversation starters to be used on prospects or clients.

2.name: Key Business Opportunities
2.description: Compare industry and market performance metrics, including 52-week high/low, intuitional ownerships, ratios, and growth percentages. Monitor quarterly and annual income states with detailed financial performance figures such as sales, profit income, expense, and earnings per share (EPS). View complete lists of top competitors, selected by Hoover’s editors, with sales, profit, and net operating cash flow data for each competitor.

3.name: Employment History
3.description: The Employment History micro app provides previous titles, positions, and past employers for a selected person. When available, affiliations such as non-employer organizations with which a person has a business or social relationship are also displayed. Possible affiliations include serving on the board of a non-profit organization, educational organization, or additional company.

47.name: Commercial Credit Score
47.description: Predict payment delinquency with the Commercial Credit Score (CCS) micro app. Embed this micro app into your CRM to anticipate whether a business pays its bills in a severely delinquent fashion (90 days or more past due), obtains legal relief from creditors, or ceases operations without paying all creditors in full over the next 12 months. A severely delinquent business is defined as having at least 25% of its payments slow and at least 10% of its payments 90 days or more past due, based on the information in D&B’s commercial database. Scores range from 101 to 670, with 101 representing the highest probability of delinquency and 671 representing the lowest probability of delinquency.

48.name: Data Stewardship
48.description: Enhance data stewardship capabilities of your MDM solution with this microapp. Whether you use Optimizer or any other matching software, have your data stewards utilize this microapp that leverages D&B best-in-class business identification, linking and information enrichment capabilities to present a list of candidates for manual selection.
